items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t remember his first French teacher\'s name.
Tom started to say something, but Mary interrupted him.
Tom stepped forward to kiss Mary, but she stepped back.
Tom stomped on the brake pedal and screeched to a halt.
Tom takes a walk almost every morning before breakfast.
Tom thought it would be dangerous for Mary to go alone.
A lot of people say Tom is the best player on our team.
After the work day was over, Tom went home to his wife.
Americans have to spend hours figuring out their taxes.
I don\'t think I\'ll stay until the end of the concert.
